name: incarcerated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
incarcerate
formal to put or keep someone in prison or in a place used as a prison: Thousands of dissidents have been interrogated or incarcerated.
to keep someone in a closed place and prevent them from leaving it: We were incarcerated in that broken elevator for four hours.
